title: Hot Take Data
description: The complete data structure containing all possible take items and templates for generating hot takes.

people.title: People
people.description: A list of influential people in the tech industry.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.description: A list of technologies, frameworks, and technical concepts

problems.title: Problems
problems.description: A list of common problems in software development.

takes.title: Takes
takes.description: A list of hot take templates.

items.title: Take Definition
items.description: A take definition which can be either a text template string or an object with a take and optional images.

anyOf.title: Take Definition Object
anyOf.description: An object that contains a take template string and an optional image or images.

image.title: Image or Images
image.description: An optional image filename or an array of image filenames associated with this take.

TakeItem.title: Take Item
TakeItem.description: A take item which can be either a text value or an object with a value and an image.

anyOf.title: Take Item Object
anyOf.description: An object that contains a text value and an image filename.

TakeItemValue.title: Value
TakeItemValue.description: The text value of the take item, which will be used when replacing placeholders.

ImageFilename.title: Image Filename
ImageFilename.description: The filename of the image associated with this item.

Take.title: Take
Take.description: The take template string, which may contain placeholders.
